column1: It also prevents anemia in the mother.
Eating a well-rounded diet with all of the right nutrients and getting at least 30 minutes of exercise per day is important for a healthy pregnancy.
Your doctor may give you a prescription for vitamins.
Though no one knows why, many pregnant women have cravings for certain foods.
This is called pica, and it may be caused by too little iron in the blood, which leads to anemia.
